title: 1 BR w/Balcony View of Lake and Includes Private Parking
posting_body: ['Upscale Sheridan Road high-rise 1 bedroom, 1.5 bath SE corner-unit with balcony for rent.', 'Available August 1st.', 'Renovated with granite countertops, ceramic tile, wood floors and stainless-steel appliances.', 'Your backyard is the park, bike-path and Osterman Beach.', 'Rent includes heat, a/c, basic cable, high-speed internet and floor-to-ceiling storage locker and private parking space.', 'Sheridan road bus in front of building and Bryn Mawr CTA Red Line train station close by.', 'Grocery stores, coffee shops and a variety of trendy local restaurants walking distance.', 'Pets under 40 lbs welcome.', 'Check out the view of the lake and downtown Chicago while BBQing on your private balcony!', 'Income/employment verification required.']
